name: Overaged (Artlock)
description:
This game was made for the Godfather Jam 2019 organized by IIM (Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia, Paris La Défense)

https://itch.io/c/611294/godfather-jam-2019-1-week

The theme was Legacy

It was made in under 3 days with 11 people

Overaged is a two-player voxel-based game in which players take the roles of two handsome old characters fighting each other to get an inheritance.

The goal is to obtain the inheritance: a mythical Katana that spreads the devil’s corruption all around.

There are two possible win conditions:

- Opening the chest containing the katana

- Killing the other player

The game will take place in a cozy yet modern little house in the suburbs with several incongruous objects spawning randomly that you can use to kill your opponent.

The game is fast, and pretty nervous.

Features:
  • 2 Local Players
  • Versus
  • Fast Paced
  • 3D
  • Isometric
